answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some resources you might find helpful.
This article discusses obstacles faced by Australian local governments when implementing Knowledge Management systems.
http://citeseerx.ist.psu.edu/viewdoc/download?doi=10.1.1.107.8840&rep=rep1&type=pdf 
This report from the Department of Administrative Service for State of New Hampshire discusses the various forms of Knowledge Management and Transfer Models.
http://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=25&ved=0CEwQFjAEOBQ&url=http%3A%2F%2Fadmin.state.nh.us%2Fhr%2Fdocuments%2FWorkforce_Development%2FKnowledge%2520Management%2520%26%2520Transfer%2520Model.doc&ei=LDaoTtDnBObr0gH0_p31DQ&usg=AFQjCNGwWzl4Z9tjckyhfLlWVmEuTFDJAg&sig2=5c_9Foo0eUP53SUYSRCzIA 
This brief document from the New York State Department of Civil Service discusses their systems of Knowledge Management Transfer.  
http://www.statetraining.ca.gov/files/06-15-04/KnowledgeManagementTransfer.pdf
A similar document from New York State describes in further details their Workforce and Succession Planning.
http://www.cs.ny.gov/successionplanning/workgroups/knowledgemanagement/ojtraining.cfm
This PowerPoint presentation from the Council of University of California Staff Assemblies describes their Knowledge Management system.
http://www.ucop.edu/ucli/presentations_10_06/km.pdf
This report details survey results about applying Knowledge Management systems to the federal government.
http://blogs.nasa.gov/cm/wiki/Federal%20Knowledge%20Management%20Working%20Group%20(KMWG).wiki/1001804main_KM_Public_Sector_Survey.pdf 
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

Ali Iannolo

author: Tracie Ringle
text: The City of Novi, Michigan is investigating implementing a Knowledge Management System to capture employee knowledge to assist with job training, position transitioning, prompt customer service, budgeting, and work efficiency.  Thus far, research has led to custom solutions or elaborate software systems.  Has anyone successfully implemented a system?  If so, please share costs, implementation procedure, effectiveness, etc.
title: Knowledge Management System
